name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone woth a 6.2-inch screen. 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality, noise cancelling wireless headphones with 50 hours of battery life and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Great fit watch that has features and functionalities like tracking calories, steps, distance and also reads pulse.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality speakers with 50 hours of battery life and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features and a stylish silver color
